title: [Discussion] I deferred my seat in round 2 . Will I loose my seat that I got in round 1.
content: I deferred my seat in round 2 . Will I loose my seat that I got in round 1.

comments.body: bro I am not sure I had the same doubt and dint attend round 2

Deferred means you didn’t choose any seat in this round and you choose to keep your seat from the previous round. You won’t lose your seat if you already attended round 1 counselling and chose a seat.
No you still got your seat from 1st round
No u won't. Pes can't afford losing money to refunds
Will there be any round 3 for PESU counselling?
